field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the name of the file.
field.required: You must enter a name for this file

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter a description for the file

field.label: Author
field.hint: Enter the author's name (Family name, Given names).

field.label: Title
field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.
field.required: You must enter a main title for this item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them here.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Citation
field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Series/Report No.
field.hint: Enter the series and number assigned to this item by your community.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type of content of the item.
field.required: You must choose at least one type.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item.

field.label: Sponsors
field.hint: Enter the names of any sponsors and/or funding codes in the box.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.

relation-field.label: Author
relation-field.hint: Enter the author's name (Family name, Given names).

field.hint: Enter the main title of the item.

field.label: Other Titles
field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them here.

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.hint: Enter the standard citation for the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Series/Report No.
field.hint: Enter the series and number assigned to this item by your community.

field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.
field.required: You must choose at least one type.

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.hint: If the item has any alternative titles, please enter them here.

relation-field.label: Author
relation-field.required: At least one author (plain text or relationship) is required

field.label: Date of Issue
field.hint: Please give the date of previous publication or public distribution. You can leave out the day and/or month if they aren't applicable.
field.required: You must enter at least the year.

field.label: Publisher
field.hint: Enter the name of the publisher of the previously issued instance of this item.

field.label: Editor Version
field.hint: Enter the URL/DOI of the editor version of this item.

field.label: Related Dataset
field.hint: Enter the URL/DOI of the related Dataset.

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: If the item has any identification numbers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes.

field.label: Title of Journal, Book or Event
field.hint: Include the name of related item like the journal name, book title or event name.

field.label: Event/Conference Place
field.hint: Enter the event location.

field.label: Conference Date
field.hint: Enter the date of the event.

field.label: Volume
field.hint: Enter the volume of the item.

field.label: Issue
field.hint: Enter the issue number of the item.

field.label: Edition
field.hint: Enter the edition of the item.

field.label: First Page
field.hint: Enter the start page number.

field.label: Last Page
field.hint: Enter the last page number.

field.label: Type
field.hint: Select the type(s) of content of the item. To select more than one value in the list, you may have to hold down the "CTRL" or "Shift" key.
field.required: You must choose at least one type.

field.label: Resource Version
field.hint: Select the version of the resource. If the resource does not have that information, please select "Not Applicable (or Unknown)".

field.label: Language
field.hint: Select the language of the main content of the item. If the language does not appear in the list, please select 'Other'. If the content does not really have a language (for example, if it is a dataset or an image) please select 'N/A'.

field.label: Subject Keywords
field.hint: Enter appropriate subject keywords or phrases.

field.label: Abstract
field.hint: Enter the abstract of the item.

field.label: Coverage
field.hint: Enter the coverage of the item, like a period, jurisdiction, etc.

field.label: Description
field.hint: Enter any other description or comments in this box.

field.label: Last name
field.hint: Enter surname or last name of the person

field.label: First name
field.hint: Enter personal or first name of the person

field.label: Author preferred name
field.hint: Enter the preferred name of this person regarding the authorship

field.label: Affiliation Name
field.hint: Enter the organizational or institutional affiliation of this person

field.label: Email
field.hint: Enter the email of the person

field.label: Author identifier
field.hint: If the author has any identifiers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes.

field.label: Project web page

field.hint: Enter the name of the funding stream of the project

field.label: Award number
field.hint: Enter the identifier of the project

field.hint: Enter the name of the orgunit or organization

field.label: Organization identifier
field.hint: If the organization has any identifiers or codes associated with it, please enter the types and the actual numbers or codes.

field.label: Organization type
field.hint: Choose the attributes of the Organization

field.hint: Enter the description of the orgunit

field.label: Reference Code
field.hint: Unique reference code for the archive (e.g., 01, 02)
field.required: You must enter a reference code

field.label: CID
field.hint: Unique Archive Identifier

field.label: Title
field.hint: Main title of the archival material

field.label: Description 1
field.hint: Primary description of the archive contents

field.label: Archive Type
field.hint: Select the type of archive
field.required: You must select an archive type

field.label: Keywords
field.hint: Enter relevant keywords separated by commas

field.label: Archival Coverage Opening Date
field.hint: Date range covered by archive (e.g., 1920 - 1975)

field.label: Calendar Type
field.hint: Select the calendar system used
field.required: You must select a calendar type

field.label: Level of Arrangement
field.hint: Select the archival level

field.label: Archival Quantity
field.hint: e.g., 157 Folders of Paper Archives

field.label: Archival Medium
field.hint: Select physical medium of archive

field.label: Provenance
field.hint: History and origin of the archival materials

field.label: Archive Accession Date
field.hint: Date when archive was accessioned into repository

field.label: Accession Number / Barcode
field.hint: Enter the accession number or barcode for this archive item

field.label: Authors
field.hint: Enter the names of authors or creators

field.label: Subjects
field.hint: Enter subject keywords or phrases

field.label: Publication Date
field.hint: Date of publication or creation

field.label: Item Type
field.hint: Select the type of content

field.label: Archival Accession Means
field.hint: How the archive was acquired

field.label: Immediate source of acquisition or transfer
field.hint: Direct source of the archival materials

field.label: Access Condition
field.hint: Select access rights for this archive

field.label: Language
field.hint: Languages present in the archival materials

field.label: Archival Security Category
field.hint: Security classification of the archive

field.label: Processing Status
field.hint: Current processing state of the archive

field.label: Physical Description
field.hint: Physical characteristics of the archival materials

field.label: Title*
field.hint: Enter the complete title of the multimedia item
field.required: Title is required for multimedia items

field.label: Alternative Titles
field.hint: Enter any alternative titles or translations (optional)

field.label: Subjects
field.hint: Enter subject keywords or phrases for this multimedia item

field.label: Creator(s)*
field.hint: Enter primary creators (director, artist, producer, photographer, etc.)
field.required: At least one creator is required

field.label: Other Contributors
field.hint: Enter other contributors (editor, cinematographer, sound designer, etc.)

field.label: Media Type*
field.hint: Select the primary type of multimedia content

field.label: Description/Abstract*
field.hint: Provide a brief description, synopsis, or abstract of the content

field.label: Keywords/Tags
field.hint: Enter relevant keywords or tags separated by commas

field.label: Creation/Recording Date
field.hint: When was this content created or recorded?

field.label: Publication/Release Date
field.hint: When was this content published or released?

field.label: File Format*
field.hint: Select the primary file format

field.label: Duration/Length
field.hint: Enter duration (HH:MM:SS) or total length

field.label: Resolution
field.hint: Enter resolution (e.g., 1920x1080, 4K, 300dpi)

field.label: File Size
field.hint: Enter file size (e.g., 250 MB, 1.5 GB)

field.label: Publisher/Producer
field.hint: Enter the publishing or production company

field.label: Series/Collection
field.hint: Is this part of a series or collection?

field.label: Copyright/Rights Statement
field.hint: Enter copyright information or rights statement

field.label: License
field.hint: Select the license for this content

field.label: Access Level
field.hint: Select the access level for this content

field.label: Identifiers
field.hint: Enter any identifiers (DOI, URL, etc.)

field.label: Additional Notes
field.hint: Enter any additional information or notes

field.label: CID*
field.hint: Enter the Collection ID number

field.label: Accession Numbers/Barcodes
field.hint: Enter accession numbers or barcodes (e.g., AV00571-2002)

field.label: Composer(s)
field.hint: Enter the composer(s) of the music

field.label: Singer(s)/Performer(s)
field.hint: Enter the singer(s) or performer(s)

field.label: Music Type/Genre
field.hint: Enter the type or genre of music (e.g., )

field.label: Music Album
field.hint: Enter the album name this track belongs to

field.label: Physical Description*
field.hint: Describe physical characteristics (e.g., 1 , 60 , 11*7 .)

field.label: Physical Medium
field.hint: Select the physical medium

field.label: Classification Number
field.hint: Enter classification number (e.g., 781.62928)

field.label: Instruments Used
field.hint: Enter instruments used in the recording

field.label: Place of Publication/Recording
field.hint: Enter the place where it was published or recorded

field.label: Acquisition Method
field.hint: Select how this item was acquired

field.label: Related Websites/URLs
field.hint: Enter related websites or URLs (e.g., YouTube links)

field.label: Poem Author(s)/Lyricist(s)
field.hint: Enter the author(s) of the poem or lyrics (e.g., )

field.label: Melody Author(s)
field.hint: Enter the author(s) of the melody (e.g., )

field.label: Instrument Player(s)
field.hint: Enter the player(s) of specific instruments (e.g., - )

field.label: Individual Song/Track Titles
field.hint: Enter individual song or track titles separated by commas (e.g., )

field.label: Track/Item Number
field.hint: Enter track number or item sequence in the album/collection

field.label: Language(s)
field.hint: Select all languages present in the content (e.g., /)
